channel.title: Ceist, Ceol, agus Cupla Focal
channel.description: A weekly audio podcast on Ireland, celtic music, and the Irish language. Test your Irish cultural literacy by answering Ken's weekly question and listen to our talented friends perform celtic music be it folk or traditional or afro-celt or new age or even a rowdy pub song! Join our group studying beginning Irish! My Podcast Alley feed! {pca-e7a23cefda31d170d83df651ef06ce76}
channel.itunes:subtitle: A question, some music, and a couple of words
channel.itunes:author: Ken Day
channel.itunes:summary: Ceist, Ceol, agus Cupla Focal is a show about Ireland, celtic music, and the Irish language.

item.title: Saint Patrick's Day with Appalachian Celtic Consort
item.itunes:author: Ken Day
item.itunes:subtitle: An introduction to our series
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about St. Patrick, play music by Appalachian Celtic Consort, and talk about features of the Irish language. Grab an Irish beverage and come join us!

item.title: Features the traditional celtic music of The Standing Stones
item.itunes:author: Ken Day
item.itunes:subtitle: second episode
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about the founding of Dublin, enjoy the music of the Standing Stones, and start our group course on the Irish language. Slainte!

item.title: Show celebrating Irish drinking songs with Marc Gunn and the Stationery Willberries
item.itunes:author: Ken Day
item.itunes:subtitle: third episode
item.itunes:summary: This week we celebrate Irish drinking songs, explore why Guinness is black, and say a few words about starting our Irish study. Slainte!
